topic.title: ZeroExpose - Centralized full text search engine ~9000 pages from ~800 sites

1_13TKg5EuhJTjff5DVuc7qSS2b4MndBnuFM.body:
> [a4io5ziuf436y0df](#comment_1_1AxJtqoxhNyjRjUptGgVoVHxgxtKRzUrpY): why centralized?
The index is quite big, it indexes everything, it would be quite hard to port to client side only. But OneSearch is quite similar and decentralized! http://127.0.0.1:43110/17SyG68UgnCATwbmnmf7pvRmQVej8ZnWUe/
